author: cbs8
title: Overland Park Marriott Ignites Travelers' Passions With Special Prairiefire Package Perfect For Weekend Getaways
text:
Overland Park Marriott
Hotel in Overland Park offers new deal with accommodations, $30 Prairiefire gift card, complimentary museum tickets and free wine or ice cream
OVERLAND PARK, Kan. , Sept. 29, Overland Park Marriott invites travelers to fuel some fun this fall with a package the whole family will love.
Before the chaos of the holidays kicks off, one of the premier hotels in Overland Park, KS , encourages guests to spend some care-free time making memories together. With the all-new Experience Prairiefire in Overland Park Package , travelers can enjoy deluxe accommodations with a $30 gift card to Prairiefire, up to four complimentary museum tickets and two bracelets that can be used on a complimentary glass of house wine or ice cream at Pinstripes. Available Thursday through Sunday with rates from just $129 to $159 a night, this package is the perfect opportunity to spur an adventure-filled weekend now through Dec. 31, 2015 .
No matter what guests are in the mood for, they'll find a spot to explore and have fun at Prairiefire in Overland Park . More than just a shopping center, Prairiefire has something for every age and interest. Check out some of the greatest mysteries of history and science at the museum, then indulge in some delicious eats at one of the numerous restaurants. Spend the afternoon shopping, head to a happy hour, then wrap up the night with a game of bowling at Pinstripes. Cinetopia brings the HD movie experience to life with theaters showing the hottest films and documentaries.
Less than 5 miles from Prairiefire, the Overland Park hotel ensures visitors are always near the action. But the fun doesn't stop there. Visitors nursing leftover energy from the day can continue their excitement at the hotel's indoor/outdoor pool, or enjoy a brisk workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center featuring a variety of cardiovascular equipment and free weights.
When it's time to wind down, guests can head to spacious accommodations designed with today's traveler in mind. Kick back and relax in luxurious bedding while enjoying premium cable and movie channels on the flat-panel TV, or catch up on work at the large desk complete with an ergonomic chair for comfortable and convenient productivity. Room service is also available from 6 a.m. to midnight for those craving a healthy breakfast, light lunch, hearty dinner, afternoon snack or late-night appetizer with a bottle of wine.
In the morning, guests can jump start another day of adventure with the full-service breakfast buffet at Epicure , or simply grab a cup of their favorite coffee from Starbucks, located right in the lobby.
To take advantage of the Experience Prairiefire in Overland Park Package, book reservations online or by calling 1-800-228-9290 and using promotional code ARN. A Friday or Saturday night stay is required.
About Overland Park Marriott
Overland Park Marriott at 10800 Metcalf Ave. in Overland Park, KS is near Overland Park Convention Center, Oak Park Mall, Prairiefire and Nerman Museum of Contemporary Art. The hotel features 11 floors, 391 rooms, 7 suites, 18 meeting rooms with 14,150 square feet of event space, 3 concierge levels, 3 restaurants, a fitness center and indoor/outdoor pool. For information, visit www.marriott.com/MCIOP or call 1-913-451-8000. Like Overland Park Marriott on Facebook .
Join Marriott Rewards now and earn points that can be redeemed for free hotel stays and room upgrades at 3,800 hotels in over 70 countries.
